name: fairy-aura

effect.sun_moon: Strengthens fairy moves for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Strengthens fairy moves for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Strengthens fairy moves for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.

short_effect: Strengthens fairy moves to 1.33× their power for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Powers up each Pokémon’s Fairy-type moves.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Powers up each Pokémon’s Fairy-type moves.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Powers up each Pokémon’s Fairy-type moves.
